title: Manipur polls: EC turns to tech, mobile apps to increase transparency, security - India Today
content: Manipur polls: EC turns to tech, mobile apps to increase transparency, security  India Today
description: In an attempt to ensure transparency and security during polling, the Election Commission is introducing new Symbol Loading Unit (SLU) as a pilot project in the Manipur elections. Officials are also using mobile apps created to streamline the election process.
